    Class

    static class 
    DatabaseManager.DatabaseManagerBuilder
    Create new DatabaseManager instances.
    Methods in de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded that return DatabaseManager.Builder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager>
    DatabaseManager.multiDatabases()
    Creates a new DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> instance that will create a new database on each call to DatabaseManager.getDatabaseInfo().
    static DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager>
    DatabaseManager.singleDatabase()
    Creates a new DatabaseManager.Builder<DatabaseManager> instance that will return a connection to the same database on each call to DatabaseManager.getDatabaseInfo().
    DatabaseManager.Builder<T>
    DatabaseManager.Builder.withCustomizer(EmbeddedPostgres.BuilderCustomizer customizer)
    Deprecated.
    Use withInstancePreparer(EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<EmbeddedPostgres.Builder>).
    DatabaseManager.Builder<T>
    DatabaseManager.Builder.withDataSourcePreparer(EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<DataSource> dataSourcePreparer)
    Add a preparer for the DataSource objects provided.
    DatabaseManager.Builder<T>
    DatabaseManager.Builder.withDataSourcePreparers(Set<EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<DataSource>> dataSourcePreparers)
    Add preparers for the DataSource objects provided.
    DatabaseManager.Builder<T>
    DatabaseManager.Builder.withInstancePreparer(EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<EmbeddedPostgres.Builder> instancePreparer)
    Add a preparer for the EmbeddedPostgres.Builder object.
    DatabaseManager.Builder<T>
    DatabaseManager.Builder.withPreparer(DatabasePreparer databasePreparer)
    Deprecated.
    Use withDataSourcePreparer(EmbeddedPostgresPreparer<DataSource>).
